reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: FY20 Information Redacted FOB. PRC surcharges for PR9387984- INL - CRAC ALL UNITS. Transp for PR8968345-INL Staff Tech Equipment-QUIT. FY20 Cell phone for Francisco Alvarez (INL TPC). A Proc surcharges for UICC Tech equipment. Transp surcharges PR9224090 Tech Equipment staff. A FY20 FOB for Francisco Alvarez INL TPC. FY20 Information Redacted Cell phone. PRC surcharges for 1930-INL-PR9224090 Tech Equipme

description.narrative: FY20 Information Redacted FOB [Covers rental and maintenance costs of computer software and related systems as well as the cost for the necessary infrastructure (i.e., servers. contractor staff, help desk, etc.) that allows Department of State employees to telework.]. PRC surcharges for PR9387984- INL - CRAC ALL UNITS 5 - 18 pickups [Covers the costs for receiving, inspecting, stocking, pulling from stock, delivery, and other related services such as the 1 percent acquisition surcharge for executing grants and contracts above post warrant levels.]. PR8968345-INL Staff Tech Equipment-QUITO POST [Covers the costs of Despatch Agency services purchased through the Working Capital Fund.]. FY20 Cell phone for Francisco Alvarez (INL TPC) [Covers the costs for local and long distance calls based on a rate-per-call basis or on the number of minutes of use under the FTS system.]. A Proc surcharges for UICC Tech equipment [Covers the costs for receiving, inspecting, stocking, pulling from stock, delivery, and other related services such as the 1 percent acquisition surcharge for executing grants and contracts above post warrant levels.]. Transp surcharges PR9224090 Tech Equipment staff [Covers the costs of Despatch Agency services purchased through the Working Capital Fund.]. A FY20 FOB for Francisco Alvarez INL TPC [Covers rental and maintenance costs of computer software and related systems as well as the cost for the necessary infrastructure (i.e., servers. contractor staff, help desk, etc.) that allows Department of State employees to telework.]. FY20 Information Redacted Cell phone [Covers the costs for local and long distance calls based on a rate-per-call basis or on the number of minutes of use under the FTS system.]. PRC surcharges for 1930-INL-PR9224090 Tech Equipme [Covers the costs for receiving, inspecting, stocking, pulling from stock, delivery, and other related services such as the 1 percent acquisition surcharge for executing grants and contracts above post warrant levels.]

participating-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

participating-org.usg:office-name: Bureau of International Narcotics and Law Enforcement Affairs

owner-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: In response to restrictions imposed by the Ecuadorian government, USAID closed its mission on September 30, 2014. Additionally, International Military Education and Training (IMET) and Foreign Military Financing (FMF) assistance halted and remaining funds were reallocated when the Ecuadorian government terminated bilateral military cooperation and asked the U.S. Embassy to end military cooperation operations by April 30, 2014. The United States will continue to promote the development of sustainable institutions and processes in Ecuador for democracy, human rights, and the rule of law. U.S. assistance will support civil society and freedom of expression in Ecuador.

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution
